law.text: No person shall act as a police instructor or engage in police training as defined in KRS 15.350 unless he shall possess a certification or waiver of certification issued by the council.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 21, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 3.
